description: Monster metadata for D&D 5e creatures, including CR, combat roles, and theme keywords

combat_roles.striker: High damage dealer, focuses on eliminating priority targets
combat_roles.tank: High HP/AC, absorbs damage and protects allies
combat_roles.artillery: Long-range damage dealer, stays at distance
